Package me.agno.gridjavacore.columns

Interface ITotalsColumn<T>

All Known Subinterfaces:
IGridColumn<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridCoreColumn
public interface ITotalsColumn<T>
Represents a column that supports calculations and totals in a grid.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getTotals

      IColumnTotals getTotals()
      Retrieves the column totals for the grid.
      Returns:
      The column totals.

    • getCalculations

      LinkedHashMap<String,Function<IGridColumnCollection<T>,Object>> getCalculations()
      Retrieves the calculations for the grid columns.
      Returns:
      A LinkedHashMap containing the calculations for the grid columns. The key is the name of the calculation and the value is a Function that calculates the result.

    • isSumEnabled

      boolean isSumEnabled()
      Determines whether the sum calculation is enabled for this column in the grid.
      Returns:
      true if the sum calculation is enabled for this column, false otherwise

    • setSumEnabled

      void setSumEnabled(boolean sumEnabled)
      Sets the sum calculation enabled or disabled for this column in the grid.
      Parameters:
      sumEnabled - true to enable the sum calculation, false to disable it

    • getSumValue

      Total getSumValue()
      Retrieves the sum value for the column in a grid.
      Returns:
      The sum value of the column in a grid.

    • setSumValue

      void setSumValue(Total sumValue)
      Sets the sum value for the column in a grid.
      Parameters:
      sumValue - The sum value to be set for the column.

    • isAverageEnabled

      boolean isAverageEnabled()
      Determines whether the average calculation is enabled for this column in the grid.
      Returns:
      true if the average calculation is enabled for this column, false otherwise

    • setAverageEnabled

      Sets whether the average calculation is enabled for this column in the grid.
      Parameters:
      averageEnabled - true to enable the average calculation, false to disable it

      boolean isCalculationEnabled()
      Determines whether the calculations are enabled for this column in the grid.

      true if the calculations are enabled for this column, false otherwise

      Sets whether the calculations are enabled for this column in the grid.
      Parameters:
      calculationEnabled - true to enable the calculations, false to disable them

    • getCalculationValues

      LinkedHashMap<String,Total> getCalculationValues()
      Retrieves the calculation values for the grid columns.
      Returns:
      A LinkedHashMap containing the calculation values for the grid columns. The key is the name of the calculation and the value is the Total object representing the calculated result.

    • setCalculationValues

      void setCalculationValues(LinkedHashMap<String,Total> calculationValues)
      Sets the calculation values for the grid columns.
      Parameters:
      calculationValues - A LinkedHashMap containing the calculation values for the grid columns. The key is the name of the calculation and the value is the Total object representing the calculated result.
